list.name: Default
list.comment: many new features in taqman plugin. the new idea is to match csv sample names to db samples (cellLineData). Also a lot of performance improvements have been made (decrease number of SQL queries by taking out most of the javascript based event system. only barcode addin does still receive updates, project tree and everything else not). changed flush style to commit, added shadow db driver for log4jdbc sql logging...

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: controller.groovy is messe dup by reformat code. attention!

MESSAGE.value: turn OLF into a IDEA 11 project
changes to taqman plugin, log2 scale, bug fixes, median, ...

many new features in taqman plugin. the new idea is to match csv sample names to db samples (cellLineData). Also a lot of performance improvements have been made (decrease number of SQL queries by taking out most of the javascript based event system. only barcode addin does still receive updates, project tree and everything else not). changed flush style to commit, added shadow db driver for log4jdbc sql logging...
controller.groovy is messe dup by reformat code. attention!
